content:
/>
VI.i.1.A.3.e
.
Incomplete Applications and Benefit Requests That Are Not Filed on a Prescribed Form
Do
not
process a denial if
a claimant has failed to submit a
claim on one of the prescribed forms identified in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.1.a
, or
substantially complete application, as defined in
M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, 1.A.4.f
.
References
:  For more information on
situations in which VA does not require the use of a prescribed form, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.A.1.b
handling claims that were established even though the claimant failed to submit a prescribed form, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 2.E
, and
handling incomplete applications, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.b
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Decision Authorization
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
